task.title: Starting a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: You can start a pipeline when it is valid. When you start a pipeline, the runs the pipeline until you stop the pipeline or shut down the .

context.p: Depending on the type of origin in the pipeline, when you restart a pipeline, the starts the pipeline from where it last stopped.

The starts from the last stopping point for the following origin types:
File Reader
Kafka Consumerany more?
For these origin types, you can configure a pipeline to forget the last stopping point and read all available data.

step.cmd: To start the pipeline, in the pipeline canvas, click the Start icon.
step.info: If the Start icon is not enabled, the pipeline is not valid or the is running a different pipeline.
